name: Detective Diary Mirror Of Death Free - A Point & Click Mystery Puzzle Adventure Game
name_original: Detective Diary Mirror Of Death Free - A Point & Click Mystery Puzzle Adventure Game
description:
"Detective Diary Mirror Of Death" is the classic style point and click adventure game.

The game starts with the missing case of a famous story writer "James Ronald Thompson". You will play as a detective named "John" to solve out the mystery behind the missing of J.R.Thompson.

Features:

- Beautiful and nice locations.
- Exciting and interesting game play.
- Mind-blowing and innovative puzzles.
- Long and engaging game play.
